item.title: About
item.description: PhD Candidate Mathematical Genomics, University of Cambridge & Wellcome Sanger Institute Research Assistant, Walter and Eliza Hall Institute MSc Probability and Statistics, University of Melbourne Optimisation Consultant, Biarri Commercial Mathematics BSc Applied Mathematics, University of Melbourne

item.title: Publications
item.description: Chou, Evelyn S, Sabia Z Abidi, Marian Teye, Aleksandra Leliwa-Sytek, Thomas S Rask, Simon A Cobbold, Gerry Q Tonkin-Hill, et al. 2017. “A High Parasite Density Environment Induces Transcriptional Changes and Cell Death in Plasmodium Falciparum Blood Stages.” FEBS J., December. doi:10.1111/febs.14370. Lees, John A, Simon R Harris, Gerry Tonkin-Hill, Rebecca A Gladstone, Stephanie Lo, Jeffrey N Weiser, Jukka Corander, Stephen D Bentley, and Nicholas J Croucher. 2018. “Fast and Flexible Bacterial Genomic Epidemiology with PopPUNK.

item.title: Software
item.description: Starmie R package developed with Stuart Lee to make post processing of population structure software output easier. rhierBAPS R package implementing the hierBAPS algorithm. Plasmodium falciparum transcriptome analysis scripts Scripts used in analysing differential expression in Plasmodium falciparum transcriptome data. VAR gene assembly pipeline A pipeline for the assembly of Plasmodium falciparum VAR genes from short read RNA-seq data.
